ST15-001.name: Atmos ST15-001
ST15-001.effect: [When Attacking] If your Leader is [Edward Newgate], you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn.

ST15-002.name: Edward Newgate ST15-002
ST15-002.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters. [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

ST15-003.name: Kingdew ST15-003
ST15-003.effect: [Blocker] [Opponent's Turn] When this Character is K.O.'d by an effect, up to 1 of your Leader gains +2000 power during this turn.

ST15-004.name: Thatch ST15-004
ST15-004.effect: [On Play] If your Leader's type includes 'Whitebeard Pirates', give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

ST15-005.name: Portgas D. Ace ST15-005
ST15-005.effect: If your Leader's type includes 'Whitebeard Pirates', this Character gains [Rush]. [Once Per Turn] If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may give this Character −2000 power during this turn instead.
